item.title: The Truce of Pests
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Experimental work made for 2017 edition of illustration contest from Folha de São Paulo newspaper. These arts consists of a series of illustrations with ironic situations between humans and pests. The idea was satirize plagues (cockroaches, rats, spiders, etc) making them help the

Read more ›

The post The Truce of Pests appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Experimental work made for 2017 edition of illustration contest from Folha de São Paulo newspaper.

These arts consists of a series of illustrations with ironic situations between humans and pests.

The idea was satirize plagues (cockroaches, rats, spiders, etc) making them help the human society for trivial things.

No more waste!
After all, they eat the same food that is out of people’s mouths.

Cleaning!
Enough of complaining of garbagemen absence!

Security!
Less expenses with failed systems!

Gratitude!
For all years being hunted like witches!

The post The Truce of Pests appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Carreta Furacão Illustration
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Ilustration work for a local party, managed by Movimento Bonanza collective, tributing Carreta Furacao, a brazilian dance group which became a internet viral phenomenom and meme. As inspiration I used Beatles and Blur album covers, featuring the group’s characters.

item.content:encoded:
Ilustration work for a local party, managed by Movimento Bonanza collective, tributing Carreta Furacao, a brazilian dance group which became a internet viral phenomenom and meme.

As inspiration I used Beatles and Blur album covers, featuring the group’s characters.

item.title: Master Sul – Folder and Card
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
The company had to improve their offline marketing to have more customers and contacts. Then, after the website, the main strategy was having an institutional folder and visit card, as printed media marketing strategies. The folder shows the company story,

Read more ›

The post Master Sul – Folder and Card appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
The company had to improve their offline marketing to have more customers and contacts. Then, after the website, the main strategy was having an institutional folder and visit card, as printed media marketing strategies.

The folder shows the company story, major clients, market presence, certified services (important to grant more reliability for who looks for something more specific).

On the cover, it shows a funny message featuring their mascots about awareness of the lack of pest control services: “Problems with unexpected visitors?”. A good reason for turning page and know more about the company.

Below it shows some mockups of the folder’s inner pages and visit card.

The post Master Sul – Folder and Card appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: 1look DMB – Logo and more
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Branding job for 1Look DMB Agency. The client didn’t wanted a distant change for the visual identity, specially regarding the orange curve and the “number 1”, then we had concluded that a modernization could do a better job.   While

Read more ›

The post 1look DMB – Logo and more appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Branding job for 1Look DMB Agency.

The client didn’t wanted a distant change for the visual identity, specially regarding the orange curve and the “number 1”, then we had concluded that a modernization could do a better job.

 

While redesigning, I have worked on a curved and more ludical way, but without going too far the old logo first-sight points (the orange curve and the number 1).


After the logo redesigning, I made arts for a flyer and visit cards.

On the flyer, I made an illustration, which had been sketched before digital designing. It shows the importance of an present communication on our routine, where the advertising is everywere, in every shape and colors.

 

The post 1look DMB – Logo and more appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: The Strokes’ strokes
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Wallpaper for The Strokes, one of the most acclaimed alternative rock bands of the early 21st century! The art was based on this official photography: www.britishpunk.com/images/Strokes/strokes_rgb_2.jpg Therefore, this illustration were part of prints of the t-shirt brand Bendita Augusta.

The post The Strokes’ strokes appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Wallpaper for The Strokes, one of the most acclaimed alternative rock bands of the early 21st century!
The art was based on this official photography: www.britishpunk.com/images/Strokes/strokes_rgb_2.jpg

Therefore, this illustration were part of prints of the t-shirt brand Bendita Augusta.

item.title: Method Supera – Illustration
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Art for folder towards an specific franchise from Supera Method, an school network that offers logical reasoning courses for all ages, most of them using the abacus as calculator. This art, features the company’s mascot, Superinha, a talking brain, on a little

Read more ›

The post Method Supera – Illustration appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Art for folder towards an specific franchise from Supera Method, an school network that offers logical reasoning courses for all ages, most of them using the abacus as calculator.

This art, features the company’s mascot, Superinha, a talking brain, on a little story where he starts upset and suffering with downgrades at school tests, and after doing Supera’s courses, he raises to a well successful state and more happy. Basically, the target public was the younger people and parents.

The post Method Supera – Illustration appeared first on BCSilva.
